name: sprint100
description: Sprint100 - React Native racing game with online multiplayer

scripts.testers:start: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npx expo start --tunnel"
scripts.testers:install: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.testers:setup: npm run testers:install && echo 'Setup complete! Run npm run testers:start to begin testing.'
scripts.deploy:render: cd server && npm run build && echo 'Deploy to Render via GitHub integration'
scripts.deploy:heroku: git push heroku main && heroku run npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy
